channel.title: Rune-Sky
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.rune-sky.com/images/text.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/1klA6.png[/img][URL=http://rune-sky.com]Homepage[/URL] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img][URL=http://www.rune-sky.com/Forum]Forums[/URL] [img]http://www.softwarecommercials.com/images/play-icon-small.gif[/img][URL=http://www.rune-sky.com/webclient.html]Play[/URL] [img]http://iconizer.net/files/Splashyfish/orig/document_small_download.png[/img][URL=http://www.rune-sky.com/Rune-Sky.jar]Download[/URL]
We are back online! The server at the moment is running on a 2 - 3 day old back up the newly updated V5 will be up and running in a couple of days. For now we have added some new features to this back up.
Here are some features
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/28sy3hc.jpg[/img] New Quests [UPDATED] Remodelled skilling A cleaner teleporting system More money making ways Slayer rates fixed Game bonuses (Ex. Detouched Darts) much more.
95% Grand Exchange 747 items 747 indexes all working auras including supreme's eco base eco pricing flaming skulls specs for all items the should have Lucky item specs and bonuses Squeal of fortune
[img]http://i46.tinypic.com/xf9un6.jpg[/img] - Switching is near perfect - All Spellbooks are accessible via Commands and altars - Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more. - Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP - Auras are all complete except for Salvation and Corruption bonuses work wings are glitched
(Bosses) - King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects - Tormented Demons with all 3 switches - Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless) - 100% Godwars - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Barrows{prizes glitchy still} & More...
Pvp/PK/PVM/Combat - Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Switching better than RS - Full Summoning!! - Armour set effects all added! - Degrading Pvp Armours - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers/Lunar)
Random Stuff: - All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons! - Quick Chat 100% - music everyone knows that - custom maps - donorzones staffzones and more
Armours/Bosses: - All new 747 armours obv we all know - Bosses are upgraded to new looks - Jad waves maxed out to 65 - Armours are almost all update to date with bonuses and stats - Each armour that need requirements on RS is same on here now - Quests are partially made
Same Old Home [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/13yj8k0.jpg[/img] Ge 100% Buying [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/24ce0k7.png[/img] Ge 100% selling [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/x39t83.jpg[/img] Money Pouch 100% [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/abph8m.jpg[/img] Recipe For Disaster Minigame [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/25g7vq1.png[/img] Zombies Minigame [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/qx9n54.png[/img] Soul Wars Rewards [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/x43nfa.png[/img] Clan Wars [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/xbzh2w.png[/img] Fight Kiln all waves now [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/1z1fgxs.png[/img] Squeal spins tab spins according to player [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/35c07io.png[/img] Inside Random Prizes [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/359xo9l.png[/img] Claim item [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/9hjngh.png[/img] Troll Invasion Minigame [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2hedco6.png[/img] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/29fn8i.png[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/214dvm.png[/img] Lobby [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/4fcp2.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/n3n6o2.png[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2dqjcle.png[/img] NOT EOC WE COPIED THE MODELS FROM KING J (all credits for customs to King J Scape) Credits for Solomon's store go to Myself and Runeslayer25 [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/34tts.jpg[/img] New interface for Solomons items and SOF [img]http://i.imgur.com/sSmFEiK.png[/img] Token system for Game Bonuses [img]http://i.imgur.com/fvozbqy.png[/img]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FPL8K-0Hoic[/youtube]
I will be uploading more updates as we go along make sure to keep up if you join us

item.title: Rune-Sky
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Samtheman5009:

Lmao now you don’t care

I didn’t care in the first place, I just hate little kids who come in here making their mouth go about something that’s under “copyrights” and that it’s “theirs” because here’s a newsflash for ya pal, none of what we’re doing is legal. None of what we use in a game client is legal. Nothing here is ours. Nothing that uses anything Jagex made is ours. You can’t claim rights to own something when you’re using something you own to steal from something else.

Read full topic

And even then we didn’t care… You’re just gravedigging an old thread with inter-server conflicts. Keep it to yourself.

item.title: Rune-Sky
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

He did own RS3 server you absolute nonce.

He owned RS3 Server a long long time ago when I was working on Zealution, about 2-3 years ago. Leave before you embarrass yourself anymore, there’s no honour amongst thieves. None of us have any right to hold up “copyrights” when we work with stolen content in the first place.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Sky
item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

[quote=“Mikeyzzz, post:61, topic:480329”][quote author=zingerman111 link=topic=598565.msg4360626#msg4360626 date=1378661601]

  • New Home
  • Better travelling distances
  • More training areas
  • More money making methods
  • Quests
  • Added Noticeboard for players to find contests, events and new updates
  • RE-added detouched darts
  • Vote4Cash system now 100% functional and working
  • Cosmetics fixed (you can now buy cosmetics with the helm)

Working on

  • Loyalty points system (Interface is up now finding configs to get the buttons working.)
  • New Items for players to earn at minigames.
  • Fixing GE dupe (finding the configs for the X- amount button)
  • working on new quests interfaces.
    [/quote]add in game total level hi-scores, it’s something small, but players become competitive and aim to exceed each other.[/quote]

Yeah I used the one that king J released it was a pretty good one too.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Sky
item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

Mikeyzzz:

Love your banners as always lol

Java-RSPS-Noob:

[quote]Thats exactly my point I will keep some stuff newer then others like jad emotes that stuff everyone loves on the newer revisions but stuff like weapon styles and the way of holding and for some people the switch between 1hand weapon that changed to 2h will also change back.

That’s what I am getting at though. Hasn’t there been major character model changes in the time of swapping from the new 2h animation to the old one? Wouldn’t that still cause issues for the character model(s) itself?[/quote]

not really its actually pretty easy all you need to do is change the Model ID for both female and male.

New interface for Solomons items and SOF

Token system for Game Bonuses

item.title: Rune-Sky
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob

@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

Thats exactly my point I will keep some stuff newer then others like jad emotes that stuff everyone loves on the newer revisions but stuff like weapon styles and the way of holding and for some people the switch between 1hand weapon that changed to 2h will also change back.

That’s what I am getting at though. Hasn’t there been major character model changes in the time of swapping from the new 2h animation to the old one? Wouldn’t that still cause issues for the character model(s) itself?
